home.title: Welcome to React + Vite + TypeScript
home.description: This is a modern React frontend project template with the following tech stack:

about.title: About Project
about.description: This is a React application example built with modern frontend tech stack.
about.detail: The project structure is clear, code is standardized, suitable as a starting template for new projects.

locale.title: Ant Design Internationalization Example
locale.description: The following components all use the Chinese language package configured by ConfigProvider, all text is displayed in Chinese.
locale.modalContent: This is a modal using Chinese language package
locale.note1: If locale={{locale}} is not configured, these components will display in English
locale.note2: The entire component tree wrapped by ConfigProvider will use the same language configuration
locale.note3: Can dynamically switch languages at runtime
